resources.string: Unable to get permission to access your location.\nQuick Temps needs access to your location in order to work correctly. \nPlease allow access before continuing.
Access to location services is required for the application to work properly. Please enable location services to continue.
Quick Temps failed to acquire location services. Location services are a required for the application to work properly. Please enable them and try again.
Quick Temps requires Google Play Services to run successfully. In particular it needs location services. Please make sure these services are installed and enabled on your device then try again.
Retrieving weather information and forecasts from OpenWeatherMap.org
Connecting OpenWeatherMap.org weather services with your device to give you the latest local weather and forecast information.

OpenWeatherMap supplies wide range of weather data including current weather, forecast, precipitations, wind, clouds, data from weather stations, lots of maps, analytics and many others. They have their own model of weather calculation that involves global meteorological broadcast data, custom WRF calculation for regions and real-time data from more than 40,000 weather stations.
This application was developed by Michael King and is available free of charge. The code is available on GitHub and licensed under Apache 2.0
Thank you for downloading and using this application.
Unfortunately there has been an error connecting to OpenWeatherMaps.org would you like to try again?
